t: Are these retail or oem? seagate won't warranty oem drives.
s: From the link provided "The limited warranty extends only to the OEM and may not be assigned or transferred without Seagate’s consent." Unless the OEM vendor has signed consent from Seagate the warranty isn't assignable to retail customers. M. Brandon &#183 April 9, 2020
